goodseaClub.title: DobroMore CLUB
goodseaClub.content: We invite everyone who wants to do good together. Your participation will bring real benefits to children and parents.

donations.title: Donations
donations.content: Be close from afar. Provide real help - help the center develop and do more good.

volunteering.title: Volunteering
volunteering.content: To selflessly help people - not everyone is capable. Living for the smile and joy of a needy child - priceless.

sidebarRight.partnershipContent: The center exists thanks to your support. To continue our work, we invite commercial and non-profit organizations, foundations, volunteers and volunteer associations, teachers, specialists in the field of psychology, medicine, psychotherapy. We won't refuse any help!
